CERTIFICATIONS

PERSONAL DETAILS

Sarah Bucklew
Aspen Estates Drive
Sachse, TX 75048
(214) 400-3173 
sarah@sarahbucklew.com
    


	Professional Profile

Experienced web developer with advanced skills in structuring, designing, and implementing responsive, user-friendly websites. Incorporating innovative use of technology, SEO to drive traffic and engage customers and custom code written to optimize the sites. Able to complete projects efficiently and satisfy customers with attractive, user friendly websites. 

Technical Skills

Advanced Programming Design Skills, LAMP, PHP, HTML/HTML5, CSS/CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, Ajax, AngularJS, Node.JS, Jmol, Jsmol, Bootstrap, etc…

Employment

Independent Contractor, Dallas, TX                            12/2012-3/2015
Freelance Developer 
Recent Freelance Clients
 	Magento Site Design & Development; Created successful landing pages from email marketing increasing holiday sales (Christmas 2014) approximately $40,000 on email marketing alone. (6 month project)
 	Performed site simplifying & optimization and overall redesign, dramatically optimized company website and SEO driven traffic increased by 100% based on implementing tracking codes. (6 month project)

 	Developed extensive SSL content management system and designed website creating web presence for Build My Scores Credit Repair Company with over a million dollars yearly revenue. (3 year project) 

•	Website design and development for diverse clients in differing fields such as medical, credit repair, real estate, entertainment and e-Commerce working within deadlines and on multiple projects for multiple clients at a time.
•	Developed secure web applications with dynamic data on dynamic websites. 
•	Developed and designed strong web presence for several startup companies. 
•	I maintain a LAMP environment on a VPS for several clients who maintain an ongoing relationship after development. 

C. Software, Dallas, TX
Developer                                                                      1/2004-12/2012
I worked with a small, but talented team of eight developers developing projects for various clients who hired our company because of our reputation. I personally worked with small. Medium, and large sized business owners to either create, expand or add functionality their current company’s web presence. 

•	Using advanced development with PHP, and theming systematically pairing with HTML, CSS, and adding appropriate interactivity with JavaScript and jQuery
•	Established web applications programming building custom interfaces on client’s websites using LAMP, HTML/CSS, PHP, MySQL JavaScript, jQuery, developing MySQL databases for data to be stored, performed scheduled site/content updates using advance search and replace method
•	Using systematic HTML and PHP for all Server Side scripts and created rich websites and applications for our clients large companies, optimized for their users. 

Note: To see more about my experience, the companies I have worked for, and various samples of my actual work/designs that I have done for various clients as an Independent Contractor, please see my Online Portfolio at http://sarahbucklew.com.


Education and Certifications

 	University of Texas, Austin, TX                                            2000-2004 (2004) BCS –Computer Science     
                            

 	O’Reilly School of Technology
(2009) PHP/MYSQL Certificate of Professional Development                                               


References
If you would like to see a list of my Professional References, they are available upon request.
